name: IT specialist
description:
The IT team of a large company, engaged in equipment sales and maintenance is inviting an IT engineer with 1-2 years track record in multinational companies with focus on IT support and infrastructure development. We are offering a comprehensive mix of responsibilities in a fast-growing environment in Rus-CIS and in close communication with the German HQ IT team.

Please kindly note this is an engineer position: we are disregarding applicants with excessive and redundant experience

  • implement projects of development and modification of IT infrastructure and IT services (organize and perform IT specific tasks fulfilment at opening or closing or moving company representations, workplaces preparation, etc.)
  • do tasks within IT projects, including the rollout of global IT projects with the Concern
  • develop and agree plans of projects realization defining schedule, control points and quality criteria. Tracking schedules, analyzing factors that may influence the projects implementation
  • routinely control the use of IT assets in regional divisions of the company and manage
  • support:
    • IT infrastructure: servers, data storage systems, network devices, server virtualization systems, power backup systems;
    • LAN;
    • Video surveillance;
    • Access control systems;
    • Corporate services: mail, ERP, portal, communications
  • access rights management
  • organization, provision and control of backups of critical data;
  • infrastructure health monitoring;
  • analysis, monitoring, optimization, documentation of IT infrastructure and IT services. Development of custom / admin instructions;
  • preparation of reports on the operation of the components that make up the IT infrastructure (reports on errors, analysis of resource use), preparation of technical documentation.

The successful candidate has:

  • Completed higher education
  • Experience in a similar position 2-3 years (Windows Server administration, Microsoft (AD, DNS, Exchange, SQL), VMware vSphere, TCP/IP, understanding OSI model, identifying network failures)
  • Experience with Cisco (Cisco Catalyst), Fortigate preferable
  • Basic knowledge of PowerShell
  • Experience in administering and maintaining SQL clusters
  • Experience in administering application servers / web servers 1C: Enterprise, understanding the principles of operation of the 1C + platform Databases, licensing
  • Experience in using SaaS, IaaS, DBaaS and other Cloud solutions, understanding the principles of work, the ability to set a task for system engineers to configure
  • Understanding of SCS and principles of organization in office / retail premises
  • Good communication, responsibility, attentiveness, punctuality, strong ability to learn - no one is seriously expecting you to have experience with everything of the above
  • Intermediate level of spoken English (need to talk to colleagues from Europe).

On offer:

  • Full time office position, some travel in the Moscow area is required (there are several locations in Moscow and Moscow region), rare trips across Russia, North-West of Moscow
  • We absolutely guarantee no career progression to candidates who cannot tolerate working with diversity of end-users and cultures and are unable to partner with business
  • Social package: complete coverage
  • Professional development opportunities
